channel.title: Table Chat on Simba Tango
channel.description: Recent content in Table Chat on Simba Tango

item.title: Waiting for the right moment
item.author: simbatango@gmail.com (Simba)
item.description: byÂ just.Luc -I see a lot of men are not dancing. They can't manage to dance when the floor is so full of people. -It may not be because of lack of ability. It may be because they enjoy the dance more when the floor is not packed and they can more around the floor in their dance. Maybe they are waiting for their favorite music.
